criterion: Provides general advice on oral hygiene without considering specific concerns
Asks the user to provide more information about their oral health concerns
Mentions that regular brushing and flossing can help prevent oral health issues
Falsely claims that mouthwash is the most effective way to prevent oral health issues
Uses technical terms and jargon that may be unfamiliar to non-dental professionals
Provides specific recommendations for improving oral hygiene based on the user's concerns
Fails to address the user's concern about plaque building up in their mouth
Correctly advises the user to visit a dentist for a professional cleaning and examination
